com.learns.crowd.mapper.insert: insert into ms_company (co_id, co_name, co_code, co_leader, co_state) values (#{coId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{coName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{coCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{coLeader,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{coState,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
com.learns.crowd.mapper.select: select co_id, co_name, co_code, co_leader, co_state from ms_company
